conformalMappings package¶

Submodules¶

conformalMappings.elementaryGeometry module¶

“

This module deals with the plotting of complex variable graphs.

conformalMappings.elementaryGeometry.anim(ip_fn, x, y, i)¶

Function which creates the cool frames for the slider. what it does is (input function - Grid) * i + Grid here grid is the function w=z

conformalMappings.elementaryGeometry.grid(x, y)¶

Created with lambdify. Signature:

func(x, y)

Expression:

x + I*y

Source code:

def _lambdifygenerated(x, y):

return (x + 1j*y)

conformalMappings.elementaryGeometry.square(z_numeric, limit_range, ticks, fine, frame)¶

Special case of rectangle, with all sides equal. Parameterized by the parameter limit_range.

conformalMappings.mappings module¶

class conformalMappings.mappings.RectangleToEccentricAnnulus(R1, R2, epsilon)¶

Bases: object

This class permits to easily create and map a rectangle to a specific eccentric annulus.

bipolarConstants()¶
Returns

  • alpha (Value of bottom boundary of rectangle.)

  • beta (Value of top boundary of rectangle.)

  • yShift1 (shift of to center the outer radius at origin)

  • cNum (pole of corresponding bipolar coordinate system)

class conformalMappings.mappings.RectangleToEllipticAnnulus(b, a)¶

Bases: object

This class permits to easily create and map a rectangle to a specific concentric elliptical annulus.
